element.name: TFPCanvasException
element.short: TFPCanvasException - exception handler for FreePascal base Canvas class

element.name: TFPPenException
element.short: TFPPenException - exception handler for FreePascal base Pen class

element.name: TFPBrushException
element.short: TFPBrushException - exception handler for FreePascal base Brush class

element.name: TFPFontException
element.short: TFPFontException exception handler for FreePascal base Font class

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas
element.short: TFPCustomCanvas - FreePascal base class for Canvas

descr.p: TFPCustomCanvas - FreePascal base class for Canvas

Many of the methods are virtual and/or abstract; there is often no supplied code for the method, but the entries act as place-holders for programmers of descendant components to provide overriding methods

element.name: TFPCanvasHelper
element.short: TFPCanvasHelper - FreePascal base class providing utilities for drawing and painting canvases

element.name: TFPCanvasHelper.GetAllocated
element.short: GetAllocated returns True if the canvas is allocated (assigned)

element.name: TFPCanvasHelper.SetFlags
element.short: SetFlags - stores specified boolean values in index-nominated flags

element.name: TFPCanvasHelper.GetFlags
element.short: GetFlags - returns the boolean value of the specified flag

element.name: TFPCanvasHelper.CheckAllocated
element.short: CheckAllocated - check whether the canvas is allocated, and if ValueNeeded if True, raises an exception if not allocated

element.name: TFPCanvasHelper.SetFixedCanvas
element.short: SetFixedCanvas - specifies whether the canvas is to be fixed

element.name: TFPCanvasHelper.DoAllocateResources
element.short: DoAllocateResources - procedure for allocating resources

element.name: TFPCanvasHelper.DoDeAllocateResources
element.short: DoDeAllocateResources - procedure for deallocationg resources

element.name: TFPCanvasHelper.DoCopyProps
element.short: DoCopyProps - copies properties from another Canvas Helper

element.name: TFPCanvasHelper.SetFPColor
element.short: SetFPColor - specify the colour using the FreePascal list

element.name: TFPCanvasHelper.Changing
element.short: Changing - software emulation of a call to the OnChanging event

element.name: TFPCanvasHelper.Changed
element.short: Changed - software emulation of a call to the OnChange event

element.name: TFPCanvasHelper.Lock
element.short: Lock the canvas so it can't be changed

element.name: TFPCanvasHelper.UnLock
element.short: UnLock a previously locked canvas

element.name: TFPCanvasHelper.Create
element.short: Create - constructor for TFPCanvasHelper: calls inherited Create then sets properties Canvas to nil, FixedCanvas and Allocated to False

element.name: TFPCanvasHelper.Destroy
element.short: Destroy - destructor for TFPCanvasHelper: de-allocates resources then calls inherited Destroy

element.name: TFPCanvasHelper.AllocateResources
element.short: AllocateResources - prepare helper for use

element.name: TFPCanvasHelper.DeallocateResources
element.short: DeallocateResources - free all resources used by this helper

element.name: TFPCanvasHelper.Allocated
element.short: If True, then helper has been Allocated

element.name: TFPCanvasHelper.FixedCanvas
element.short: FixedCanvas - properties cannot be changed when allocated

element.name: TFPCanvasHelper.Canvas
element.short: Canvas for which the helper is allocated

element.name: TFPCanvasHelper.FPColor
element.short: FPColor - colour of the helper

element.name: TFPCanvasHelper.OnChanging
element.short: OnChanging - event handler while change is occurring

element.name: TFPCanvasHelper.OnChange
element.short: OnChange - event handler when a change has occurred

element.name: TFPCanvasHelper.DelayAllocate
element.short: DelayAllocate - if True, then allocation is to be delayed

element.name: TFPCustomFont
element.short: TFPCustomFont - FreePascal base class for Fonts

element.name: TFPCustomFont.SetName
element.short: SetName - specify the name of the Font

element.name: TFPCustomFont.SetSize
element.short: SetSize - specify the size for the Font

element.name: TFPCustomFont.CopyFont
element.short: CopyFont - returns a copy of the font with all properties the same, but not allocated

element.name: TFPCustomFont.GetTextSize
element.short: GetTextSize - finds the size (w: width, h: height) of the specified text in the current font

element.name: TFPCustomFont.GetTextHeight
element.short: GetTextHeight - returns the height of the specified text

element.name: TFPCustomFont.GetTextWidth
element.short: GetTextWidth - returns the width of the specified text

element.name: TFPCustomFont.Name
element.short: The Name of the current Font

element.name: TFPCustomFont.Size
element.short: The Size of the current Font

element.name: TFPCustomFont.Bold
element.short: Is the Font Bold?

element.name: TFPCustomFont.Italic
element.short: Is the Font Italic?

element.name: TFPCustomFont.Underline
element.short: Is the Font Underline?

element.name: TFPCustomFont.StrikeTrough
element.short: Is the Font StrikeTrough?

element.name: TFPCustomFontClass
element.short: TFPCustomFontClass - class of TFPCustomFont

element.name: TFPPenStyle
element.short: TFPPenStyle - Solid, Dash, Dot, DashDot, DashDotDot, insideFrame, Pattern, Clear

element.name: TFPPenStyle.psSolid
element.short: A solid drawn pen

element.name: TFPPenStyle.psDash
element.short: A dashed drawn pen

element.name: TFPPenStyle.psDot
element.short: A dotted drawn pen

element.name: TFPPenStyle.psDashDot
element.short: A pen drawn with alternating dashes and dots

element.name: TFPPenStyle.psDashDotDot
element.short: A pen drawn with alternating dashes and double dots

element.name: TFPPenStyle.psinsideFrame
element.short: A solid pen with offset depending on pen width
element.descr: A solid pen that is offset so the perimeter of the drawn figure is always the same independent of the line width.

element.name: TFPPenStyle.psPattern
element.short: A custom drawn pattern

element.name: TFPPenStyle.psClear
element.short: A clear pen (nothing is drawn)

element.name: TFPPenStyleSet
element.short: TFPPenStyleSet - set of TFPPenStyle

element.name: TFPPenMode
element.short: TFPPenMode - Black, White, Nop, Not, Copy, NotCopy, MergePenNot, MaskPenNot, MergeNotPen, MaskNotPen, Merge, NotMerge, Mask, NotMask, Xor, NotXor

element.name: TFPCustomPen
element.short: TFPCustomPen - FreePascal base class for Pens

element.name: TFPCustomPen.SetMode
element.short: SetMode specifies Pen Mode

element.name: TFPCustomPen.SetWidth
element.short: SetWidth - specifies width of the Pen

element.name: TFPCustomPen.SetStyle
element.short: SetStyle - specifies style for the Pen

element.name: TFPCustomPen.SetPattern
element.short: SetPattern - specifies the pattern for the Pen

element.name: TFPCustomPen.CopyPen
element.short: CopyPen - returns a copy of the pen with all properties the same, but not allocated

element.name: TFPCustomPen.Style
element.short: The Style of the Pen

element.name: TFPCustomPen.Width
element.short: The Width in pixels of the current Pen

element.name: TFPCustomPen.Mode
element.short: The Mode of the Pen

element.name: TFPCustomPen.Pattern
element.short: The Pattern for the Pen

element.name: TFPCustomPenClass
element.short: TFPCustomPenClass - class of TFPCustomPen

element.name: TFPBrushStyle
element.short: TFPBrushStyle - Solid, Clear, Horizontal, Vertical, FDiagonal, BDiagonal, Cross, DiagCross, Image, Pattern

element.name: TFPCustomBrush
element.short: TFPCustomBrush - FreePascal base class for Brushes

element.name: TFPCustomBrush.SetStyle
element.short: SetStyle - specifies the style for the Brush

element.name: TFPCustomBrush.SetImage
element.short: SetImage - specifies the Image for use with the Brush (eg if BrushStyle is bsImage)

element.name: TFPCustomBrush.CopyBrush
element.short: CopyBrush - returns a copy of the brush with all properties the same, but not allocated

element.name: TFPCustomBrush.Style
element.short: The Style for the current Brush

element.name: TFPCustomBrush.Image
element.short: The Image to be used in the Brush (if Style is bsImage)

element.name: TFPCustomBrush.Pattern
element.short: The Pattern to use for the Brush (if Style is bsPattern)

element.name: TFPCustomBrushClass
element.short: TFPCustomBrushClass - class of TFPCustomBrush

element.name: TFPCustomInterpolation
element.short: TFPCustomInterpolation - FreePascal base class for interpolations while drawing in unspecified regions between specified points

element.name: TFPCustomInterpolation.Initialize
element.short: Initialize - the image ready to apply interpolation

element.name: TFPCustomInterpolation.Execute
element.short: Execute the interpolation

element.name: TFPCustomInterpolation.Canvas
element.short: The Canvas on which the interpolation is to be applied

element.name: TFPCustomInterpolation.Image
element.short: The Image to which the interpolation is to be applied

element.name: TFPBaseInterpolation
element.short: TFPBaseInterpolation - the default interpolation to be applied if no other is specified

element.name: TFPBaseInterpolation.Filter
element.short: Filter factor to be used in interpolating

element.name: TFPBaseInterpolation.MaxSupport
element.short: MaxSupport factor for interpolation

element.name: TMitchelInterpolation
element.short: TMitchelInterpolation - one possible algorithm for interpolation

element.name: TMitchelInterpolation.Filter
element.short: Filter uses specific constants as coefficients in a polynomial interpolation

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoCreateDefaultFont
element.short: DoCreateDefaultFont - returns a newly created default Font

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoCreateDefaultPen
element.short: DoCreateDefaultPen - returns a newly created default Pen

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoCreateDefaultBrush
element.short: DoCreateDefaultBrush - returns a newly created default Brush

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.SetFont
element.short: SetFont - specifies the Font to use

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.SetBrush
element.short: SetBrush - specifies the Brush to use

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.SetPen
element.short: SetPen - specifies the Pen to use

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoAllowFont
element.short: DoAllowFont - returns True if specified Font is valid

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoAllowPen
element.short: DoAllowPen - returns True if specified Pen is valid

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoAllowBrush
element.short: DoAllowBrush - returns True if specified Brush is valid

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.SetColor
element.short: SetColor - specifies colour at the given location

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.GetColor
element.short: GetColor - finds the colour at the given location

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.SetHeight
element.short: SetHeight -sspecifies Canvas height

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.GetHeight
element.short: GetHeight - returns the height of the Canvas

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.SetWidth
element.short: SetWidth - specifies the width of the Canvas

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.GetWidth
element.short: GetWidth - returns the Width

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.GetClipRect
element.short: GetClipRect - returns the coordinates of the rectangle used for clipping

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.SetClipRect
element.short: SetClipRect - specifies the rectangle to use for clipping

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.SetPenPos
element.short: SetPenPos - specifies the position of the Pen

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoLockCanvas
element.short: DoLockCanvas - method for locking the Canvas, making it impossible to change

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoUnlockCanvas
element.short: DoUnlockCanvas - method for unlocking a previously locked Canvas

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoTextOut
element.short: DoTextOut - method for writing given text out at specified location

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoGetTextSize
element.short: DoGetTextSize - method for finding the size (stored as w: width, h: height) of the given text

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoGetTextHeight
element.short: DoGetTextHeight - returns the height of the given text

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoGetTextWidth
element.short: DoGetTextWidth - returns the width of the given text

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoRectangle
element.short: DoRectangle - method for drawing a rectangle in the given position

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoRectangleFill
element.short: DoRectangleFill - method for filling a rectagle in the given location

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoRectangleAndFill
element.short: DoRectangleAndFill - method for drawing a rectangle and filling it at the given location

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoEllipseFill
element.short: DoEllipseFill - method for filing an ellipse at the given location

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoEllipse
element.short: DoEllipse - method for drawing an ellipse at the given location

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoEllipseAndFill
element.short: DoEllipseAndFill - method for drawing an ellipse and filling it at the given location

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoPolygonFill
element.short: DoPolygonFill - method for filling a polygon at the given location (using supplied array of points)

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoPolygon
element.short: DoPolygon - method for drawing a polygon using the given array of points

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoPolygonAndFill
element.short: DoPolygonAndFill - method for drawing a polygon and filling it using the given array of points

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoPolyline
element.short: DoPolyline - method for drawing a PolyLine uing the given array of points

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoFloodFill
element.short: DoFloodFill - method for Flood-Filling an area strarting at the given location

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoMoveTo
element.short: DoMoveTo - method to move the drawing cursor to the specified point

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoLineTo
element.short: DoLineTo - method for drawing a line between the current cursor position and the specified point

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoLine
element.short: DoLine - method for drawing a line between two specified points

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoCopyRect
element.short: DoCopyRect - method to copy the source rectangle SourceRect to the specified position on another Canvas

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.DoDraw
element.short: DoDraw - method to draw the nominated Image at the specified location

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.CheckHelper
element.short: CheckHelper - method to ensure that a valid Helper has been called

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.AddHelper
element.short: AddHelper - method to add a helper to the list

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.create
element.short: create - constructor for TFPCustomCanvas. Performs inherited Create, creates helpers, sets up default sizes and pen, brush and font

descr.p: create - constructor for TFPCustomCanvas. Performs inherited Create, creates helpers, sets up default sizes and pen, brush and font
Overrides ancestor constructor, and may be overridden by descendants

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.destroy
element.short: Destroy - destructor for TFPCustomCanvas: frees helpers and default pen, brush and font, then performs inherited Destroy

descr.p: Destroy - destructor for TFPCustomCanvas: frees helpers and default pen, brush and font, then performs inherited Destroy
Overrides ancestor destructor; may be overridden by descendants

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.LockCanvas
element.short: LockCanvas, ensuring no changes can be made

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.UnlockCanvas
element.short: UnlockCanvas - frees a previously locked Canvas

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.Locked
element.short: Returns True if Canvas is Locked

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.CreateFont
element.short: CreateFont - returns a Font that has been created

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.CreatePen
element.short: CreatePen - returns a Pen that has been created

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.CreateBrush
element.short: CreateBrush - returns a Brush that has been created

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.TextOut
element.short: Writes the Text string at the position X, Y on the canvas and leaves the pen at the end of the text

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.GetTextSize
element.short: GetTextSize - finds the size (stored as w: width, h: height) of the specified text

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.GetTextHeight
element.short: GetTextHeight - returns height of the specified text

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.GetTextWidth
element.short: GetTextWidth - returns width of the specified text

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.Ellipse
element.short: Ellipse - method to draw an ellipse to fit the given rectangle

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.EllipseC
element.short: EllipseC - method to draw an ellipse given starting coordinates and radii for x- and y- directions

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.Polygon
element.short: Method to draw a Polygon, ie a closed figure with the last point joined to the first

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.Polyline
element.short: Method to draw a Polyline, ie a figure connecting the points in sequence, but not necessarily producing a closed figure

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.Rectangle
element.short: Method to draw a Rectangle within the specified bounds, or given the limiting coordinates

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.FloodFill
element.short: Method to FloodFill an area with colour, starting at the given point

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.Clear
element.short: Method to Clear the Canvas

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.MoveTo
element.short: Moves cursor to new position X1, Y1 without drawing anything

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.LineTo
element.short: LineTo - draw a line between the current Pen position and the specified point

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.Line
element.short: Draw a Line between the first and second points

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.CopyRect
element.short: CopyRect - copies a rectangle from SourceRect to the specified position on a nominated Canvas

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.Draw
element.short: Draw the nominated Image at the specified location

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.StretchDraw
element.short: StretchDraw - steretch out the image being drawn to fit the supplied location and size

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.Erase
element.short: Erase - clear away the drawing

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.Font
element.short: The Font to be used for text in this Canvas

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.Pen
element.short: The Pen to be used for writing in this Canvas

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.Brush
element.short: The Brush for the current Canvas

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.Interpolation
element.short: The Interpolation algorithm to be used for connecting the indeterminate areas between specified points in an Image

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.Colors
element.short: The Colors to be used for this Canvas

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.ClipRect
element.short: ClipRect - the rectangle to be used for clipping

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.Clipping
element.short: If True, then Clippingis being applied to images on this Canvas

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.PenPos
element.short: PenPos - the current position of the Pen

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.Height
element.short: The Height of the Canvas

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.Width
element.short: The Width of the Canvas

element.name: TFPCustomCanvas.ManageResources
element.short: ManageResources - if True, then resource management is being used

element.name: TFPCustomDrawFont
element.short: TFPCustomDrawFont - base class for drawing fonts

element.name: TFPCustomDrawFont.DoDrawText
element.short: DoDrawText - method for drawing text

element.name: TFPCustomDrawFont.DoGetTextSize
element.short: DoGetTextSize - method for finding size of text

element.name: TFPCustomDrawFont.DoGetTextHeight
element.short: DoGetTextHeight - returns height of text

element.name: TFPCustomDrawFont.DoGetTextWidth
element.short: DoGetTextWidth - returns width of text

element.name: TFPEmptyFont
element.short: TFPEmptyFont - dummy class for empty font

element.name: TFPCustomDrawPen
element.short: TFPCustomDrawPen - base class for pen used for drawing figures

element.name: TFPCustomDrawPen.DoDrawLine
element.short: DoDrawLine - draw a line from first to second point

element.name: TFPCustomDrawPen.DoPolyline
element.short: DoPolyline - draw a Polyline connecting points of the array in sequence, and closing the figure if Close is True

element.name: TFPCustomDrawPen.DoEllipse
element.short: DoEllipse - draws an ellipse within the specified space

element.name: TFPCustomDrawPen.DoRectangle
element.short: DoRectangle - draws a rectangle with the given coordinates

element.name: TFPEmptyPen
element.short: TFPEmptyPen - dummy class for empty pen

element.name: TFPCustomDrawBrush
element.short: TFPCustomDrawBrush - base class for brush used for drawing

element.name: TFPCustomDrawBrush.DoRectangle
element.short: DoRectangle - draws a rectangle within the given bounds

element.name: TFPCustomDrawBrush.DoEllipse
element.short: DoEllipse - draws an elipse to fit the given bounds

element.name: TFPCustomDrawBrush.DoFloodFill
element.short: DoFloodFill - Fllod-Fill an area with colour, starting at the given point

element.name: TFPCustomDrawBrush.DoPolygon
element.short: DoPolygon - produce a closed Polygon using the given array of points

element.name: TFPEmptyBrush
element.short: TFPEmptyBrush - dummy class for empty brush
